LanguageData.SoilTilled.label: garden soil
LanguageData.SoilTilled.description: Till soil to make a small improvement in soil growing condition.
LanguageData.PlaceSoil.label: Place Soil
LanguageData.PlaceSoil.description: Places dirt onto smoothed floors to grow crops.
LanguageData.ReclaimSoil.label: Reclaim Soil
LanguageData.ReclaimSoil.description: Digs up sand, marshy soil, mud, marsh, ice, gravel and places dirt to grow crops.
LanguageData.PlowSoil.label: plow soil
LanguageData.PlowSoil.description: Plow soil for much improved growing conditions.
LanguageData.Mud.label: mud
